mapper.insert: insert into s_parti (P_NO, S_NO, P_USERID, P_INTRO, P_TELL, P_REGDATE) values (S_PARTI_SEQ.nextval, #{s_no}, #{p_userid}, #{p_intro}, #{p_tell} , SYSDATE )
mapper.select: select s.s_no,s.s_level, s.s_category, s.s_title, s.s_startdate , s.s_enddate , s.s_userid, p.starscore_parti from s_enroll s, s_parti p where s.s_no = p.s_no and s.s_no in (select s_no from s_parti where p_userid= #{User_Id} group by s_no) order by s_startdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_parti (P_NO, T_NO, P_USERID, P_INTRO, P_TELL, P_REGDATE) values (T_PARTI_SEQ.nextval, #{t_no}, #{p_userid}, #{p_intro}, #{p_tell} , SYSDATE )
